header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Schedule 5, page 104, line 28, after “expertise” insert “including one or more members with expertise in research and one or more with expertise in medical education and training”
000: Schedule 5, page 107, line 33, at end insert—
“( ) HEE should seek the advice of those bodies concerned with setting standards for education and training, including the regulatory bodies and Royal Colleges.”
000: Clause 86, page 73, line 5, leave out paragraph (b) and insert—
text.IndentOne: “(b) the use of research evidence to ensure the rapid uptake of innovations into practice.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 86, page 73, line 5, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) co-operation with bodies, including the Academy of Medical Royal Colleges, the General Medical Council, the General Dental Council and the Nursing and Midwifery Council, engaged in education and training.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 86, page 73, line 12, at end insert—
“( ) HEE must exercise its functions to secure that research and innovation are incorporated into education and training.”
000: Clause 88, page 74, line 32, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) the desirability of promoting research and innovation in clinical practice,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 89, page 75, line 6, at end insert “, including the Academy of Medical Royal Colleges, the General Medical Council, the General Dental Council, the Nursing and Midwifery Council and other bodies involved in the provision of education and training and the maintenance of their standards”

000: Clause 90, page 75, line 21, leave out from “84(1)” to “, so” in line 23 and insert “, 85(1) and 86(2) (planning and delivering education for health care workers, ensuring sufficient skilled health care workers and promoting research and the use of research evidence in the health service)”
000: Clause 90, page 75, line 30, at end insert—
“(6) In performing its functions, an LETB must take account of advice from university medical and nursing schools in its area.”
000: Clause 90, page 75, line 30, at end insert—

“( ) As a committee of HEE, an LETB must support HEE in exercising its functions under section 86 (quality improvement in education and training, etc.), including subsection (2) of that section, so far as it is exercisable in or in relation to the LETB’s area.”
000: Clause 91, page 76, line 2, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) persons with expertise in education and training, including postgraduate deans or their representatives.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 93, page 78, line 8, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) universities and other educational bodies engaged in education and training of health professionals,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 98, page 81, line 38, after “research” insert “, including that undertaken by the research and development committees of NHS trusts”
000: Clause 98, page 82, line 11, after “2006” insert “, providers commissioned to deliver services for the NHS”
000: Clause 98, page 82, line 12, leave out “have regard to” and insert “comply with”
000: Clause 98, page 82, line 14, at end insert “and transparency in reporting clinical trials”
000: Clause 74, page 62, line 17, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) send a copy of the warning notice to Monitor in the case of an NHS foundation trust and the Trust Development Authority in the case of an NHS trust”

text.quote: 000: Clause 74, page 62, line 25, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) must in the case of an NHS trust require the Trust Development Authority to consider advising the Secretary of State to appoint a trust special administrator to run the trust and ensure high quality sustainable services for the future”

text.quote: 000: Clause 76, page 63, line 38, at end insert—

“( ) The Commission and the Trust Development Authority must act in accordance with equivalent arrangements to those for foundation trusts when appointing a trust special administrator to run an NHS trust.”
000: Clause 77, lord Warner gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 77 stand part of the Bill.
000: Clause 79, page 66, line 13, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) a Chief Primary and Community Care Inspector,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 80, page 67, line 19, at end insert “including their integration with other relevant services”
000: Clause 80, page 67, line 33, at end insert “including their integration with other relevant services”
000: Clause 80, page 67, line 43, at end insert “providing such indicators as enable fair comparisons to be made on the performance of providers of similar classes of services”
000: Clause 81, page 69, line 2, at end insert—

“( ) Under the terms of registration the Commission must require a care provider to ensure that all personnel exercise a duty of candour in their contacts with patients, service users and their families or representatives.”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 4, at end insert—

“( ) The Secretary of State in making regulations or issuing guidelines under this Part must have regard to the general duty of local authorities, in exercising a function under this Part in the case of an individual, to promote that individual’s well-being.”
